title: BONUS POD:  "He has a lot of edits."
description: Cody Keenan, President Obama's chief speechwriter in the second term, joins Jon and Jon to talk about speechwriting, working for Obama, and lessons learned over eight years in the White House.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
